page.title: 09KINSON_SOCIAL LIFE
page.content: I live in the Broadway in Kinson.There is a social club behind my house.At night I can hear the music.The club has a very large field attached to it.In the field they play rugby, cricket and football.A football team hire the field. In the summer they hold dog races for people who want to race their dogs against other dogs.Some people hire the club for parties. You are only allowed to go into their field if you have permission. There is an old stadium where people used to sit and watch football.Now it is dangerous as it is falling down. Lots of people go there because it is close to where they live.
